name: Minotaur
description: Minotaurs are powerful beings with bull-like heads and muscular humanoid bodies. Due to their frightening nature and inconvenient size, they rarely live outisde the underground society they have built for themselves on Kragfel. Their culture is typically divided between advancing their society or regressing into their historic service with dark entities who would have them serve another cause.

options.name: Large
options.description: Minotaurs are large creatures. All of your physique skills are upgraded and your finesse skills downgraded. Additionally, you take up a 2x2 unit area.

options.name: Action : Bullcharge
options.description: You take a modified version of the Sprint action, which allows you to shove a creature your size or smaller if you travel at least half of your total sprint speed. If the shove is successful, the creature takes 2 physical damage for each unit you traveled during your sprint.

options.name: Dark Blood of the Ancients
options.description: The blood of the first Minotaurs courses through your veins, tainting it with dark magic that makes you more vulnerable to celestials. You suffer a -3 penalty to your divine mitigation.

options.name: Primitive
options.description: Your logic, academics knowledge and magic knowledge skills are downgraded. Additionally, you can only learn languages at a basic level.
